tool_description: Logo detection technology identifies logos in images & video. The API takes an image as an input and outputs the coordinates of the logo.
name: Logo detection
title: Logo detection

api_list.name: Logo detection from attached image file
Logo detection from image (url)
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://logo-detection.p.rapidapi.com/logo-detection"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "logo-detection.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://logo-detection.p.rapidapi.com/logo-detection"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "logo-detection.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
